title: Taliyah's W Quotes

replies.body:
Hi friends! As Krabohod mentioned, Taliyah's W voice lines simply unintentionally broke somewhere down the line, and I wasn't aware until there was a discussion on the boards. Remember that if you notice VO or SFX missing, keep reporting those bugs here on the boards and your boy Zimber will fix 'em right up for ya.

Agreed that her W quotes are some of my favorite lines or hers, and it's a bummer they were gone as long as they were! For the next patch, I've fixed them on her Freljord skin as well, and I've also improved the way they fire off (as right now they emanate from the rock, and that's well...a bit weird).

Happy Taliyah mains make a happy Zimberfly. Catch ya on the Rift!

Yeah try her out and use her w! She says some great stuff I thought was disabled or they took out of the game. So happy to see they made their way back. if you ever want to main her I can offer tips and such!
It was a bug that Riot fixed cause of discussion on this voard
It could be a bug, it has happened with other champs in the past (Rengar for example)
